ai-patthana22.33:0.2_0: under the influence of the Dhamma: the Protector of the Three Worlds
ai-patthana22.33:0.3_0: used to be exhausted by the attachment for the clinging.
ai-patthana22.33:1.1_0: One doesn’t give rise to repulsion for grasping. Not grasping is a condition for grasping.
ai-patthana22.33:1.1_1: This is the section in brief.
